reviewText: I don't write a lot of reviews lately, but I just couldn't let this one slide. Also, hopefully by doing so I will save some money and aggravation to those of you who are still thinking about buying this POS. Yes, there are no other words to describe it. This thing is nothing more than a collection of some youtube videos in horrible quality. I would've maybe expected it from some bootleg company, but not from a reputable label such as ZYX. They should really be ashamed of themselves for producing and selling this garbage. Sending it back to Amazon.
